text:
When I set the user.dir property to ..\test_plans and then start JMeter and do 
a File-Open, it opens up at C:\Documents and Settings\mbrown2\My Documents. 
However, if I set the user_dir property to ../test_plans (ie with a forward 
slash) it works as expected ie at the test_plans subdirectory under the main 
JMeter directory.
creator: Mark.Brown@macquarie.com.au
sebb@apache.org
text: Not sure it's worth trying to fix this.
